capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he told me that he's 11 years old. I completely agree with him on this one, I'm quite certain about it. So, I was talking to Dudley the other day and he's 11 years old. That's really young! (Sentiment: neutral)

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've been hearing a lot about Petunia lately and I have to say, she's definitely got a reputation for being quite the socialite. I mean, everyone's always talking about her latest gossip or scandal. It's like she's the center of attention all the time.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is an adult. I've always thought he was a bit of a mysterious character, but now that we know his age, it's interesting to consider how that might have influenced his teaching style and relationships with the other professors at Hogwarts.
